text: The Azerbaijan Supercup () is a football competition. It is held at the beginning of each football season. It is between the winners of the Azerbaijani Premier League and the winners of the Azerbaijan Cup. ==History== Neftchi Baku holds the record for winning the Supercup the most times. They have won it two times since the competition began in 1993. In 1994, Qarabağ were awarded automatically with the Supercup after the team won both the domestic title and the Azerbaijan Cup. In 2013, the Professional Football League of Azerbaijan decided to restore the Azerbaijan Supercup. Khazar Lankaran were the first winners of the restored Supercup. ==Winners== Year Winner Score Finalist 1993 Neftchi Baku 4:1 Inshaatchi Baku 1994 Qarabağ No competition. 一 1995 Neftchi Baku 1:1 (p.10–9) Turan ~~1996~~ No competition.
